marklogic.body: Afridi has been a very successful limited overs bowler in the last 3-4 years. He has consistently taken wickets and bowls his full quota of overs. Razzaqs bowling has become a liability. He cant complete his full quota as he starts getting hammered. You cant keep him in the team purely for his batting as he will come Off once in a while like Afridi. Also he is very suspect against top class quicks and leg spinners. Personally, i feel the allrounder in the team needs to atleast fill up one permanent Spot. Afridi is doing that with the ball. Unfortunately Razzaq is neither a specialist batsman nor a specialist bowler. His inclusion disturbs the balance of the team.
